import axios from"axios";import{GET_POSTS,POST_ERROR}from"./types";//Get posts
export const getPosts=()=>async dispatch=>{try{const res=await axios.get('/.api/posts');dispatch({type:GET_POSTS,payload:res.data});}catch(error){dispatch({type:POST_ERROR,payload:{msg:error.response.statusText,status:error.response.status}});}};
